items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable WordPress plugin that adds an exit intent popup to engage visitors before they leave your website. Showcase important messages, offers, or prompts in a stylish and user-friendly manner. This plugin ensures a seamless user experience and can be easily configured to suit your specific needs.
